metadata.title: Generate hiPSC reporter line with FRT-flanked STOP-mKate2-HA

annotations.description: To functionally validate the fate potential of different progenitor populations in epicardioids, we generated an hiPSC reporter line in which a flippase (FLP) recognition target (FRT)-flanked neomycin cassette blocking transcription of a pCAG-driven fluorescent reporter (mKate2) fused to a hemagglutinin (HA) tag was knocked into the AAVS1 safe harbor locus49 (Supplementary Results and Supplementary Fig. 4aâ€“f).
